mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLUB_BOARD (CLUB_BOARD_ID, CLUB_NAME, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_CLUB_BOARD.NEXTVAL, #{clubName}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content})
INSERT INTO CLUB_BOARD_IMG (BOARD_IMG_ID, BOARD_ID, IMAGE) VALUES( SEQ_CLUB_CATEGORY_IMG.NEXTVAL , SEQ_CLUB_BOARD.CURRVAL , #{image})
